question.title: Arrays.hashcode(int[]) gives same hash for different elements
question.body:
I am trying to calculate a hash based on the integers in an array. I am expecting arrays with different integers to not have the same hashcode:

given [72, 99] and doing Arrays.hashcode([72,99]) I get 3292

given [73, 68] and doing Arrays.hashcode([73, 68]) I also get 3292

Does someone know why this is occuring and have an alternative to what I am trying to achieve?
